alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, south central Chambers and southeastern Harris Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smith Point, or 14 miles southeast of Beach City, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern League City, Galveston Causeway, Texas City, Dickinson, La Marque, southern Seabrook, Kemah, Bayou Vista, Clear Lake Shores, Tiki Island, San Leon, Bacliff, Smith Point, Kemah Boardwalk, Pelican Island, Bolivar Peninsula and Oak Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island
